OO pattern called when a softwall is destroyed by a bomb exploding
update(Observable, Object) - Method in class view.Tile
OO pattern doesn't require to be implemented as soft walls have their own implementation of update walls and empty tiles don't need to be updated by model

OO pattern used to add black boxes to the timer to mark passing of time
